Verses: 1 baabilon Raajaavaagiya Nebugaadhnechchaar, Yoyaakkeemin Kumaaranaagiya Ekoniyaa Engira Yoodhaavin Raajaavaiyum, Yoodhaavin Prabukkalaiyum, Erusalemilulla Thachcharaiyum Kollaraiyum Siraippidiththu, Baabilonukkuk Konduponapinbu, Idho, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththinmun Vaikkappattirundha Aththippazhangalulla Irandu Koodaigalaik Karththar Enakkuk Kaanbiththaar.
2 oru Koodaiyile Mudhal Kandhaayaththu Aththippazhangalukku Samaanamaana Migavum Nalla Aththippazhangalum, Matrak Koodaiyile Pusikkaththagaadha Migavum Ketta Aththippazhangalum Irundhadhu.

3 karththar Ennai Nokki: Eremiyaave, Nee Ennaththaik Kaangiraai Endraar; Adharku Naan: Aththippazhangalaik Kaangiren; Nallavaigalaana Aththippazhangal Migavum Nallavaigalum, Kettavaigalo Pusikkaththagaadha Migavum Kettavaigalumaayirukkiradhu Endren.
4 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
5 naan Ivvidaththilirundhu, Kaldheyar Dhesaththukku Siraippattuppogavitta Yoodharai Naan Indha Nalla Aththippazhangalukku Oppittu, Avargalukku Nanmaiyundaaga Avargalai Angigarippen.

6 avargalukku Nanmaiyundaaga Naan En Kangalai Avargalmel Vaiththu, Avargalai Indha Dhesaththukkuth Thirumbivarappanni, Avargalaik Kattuven, Avargalai Idikkamaatten, Avargalai Naattuven, Avargalaip Pidungamaatten.

7 naan Karththar Endru Ariyum Irudhayaththai Avargalukkuk Koduppen; Avargal En Janamaayiruppaargal, Naan Avargal Dhevanaayiruppen; Avargal Thangal Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Ennidaththirkuth Thirumbuvaargal Endru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sollugiraar.

8 pusikkaththagaadha Ketta Aththippazhangalaith Thallividuvadhupola, Naan Sidhekkiyaa Engira Yoodhaavin Raajaavaiyum Avanudaiya Prabukkalaiyum, Indha Dhesaththile Meedhiyaana Erusalemin Kudigalaiyum, Egipthu Dhesaththil Kudiyirukkiravargalaiyum Thallivittu,

9 avargalukkuth Theemaiyundaaga Avargalai Boomiyilulla Ellaa Raajyangalilum Alaindhu Thirigiravargalaagavum, Naan Avargalaith Thuraththivitta Ellaa Idangalilum Nindhaiyaagavum, Pazhamozhiyaagavum, Vasaichchollaagavum, Saabamaagavum Vaiththu,

10 avargalukkum Avargal Pidhaakkalukkum Naan Koduththa Dhesaththil Avargal Iraadhapadikku Nirmoolamaagumattum, Avargalukkulle Pattayaththaiyum, Panjaththaiyum, Kollainoyaiyum Anuppuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
